sentences.en: Both mushrooms look innocuous but are in fact deadly.
sentences.cn: 这两种蘑菇看起来似乎都无害，实际上却是致命的。

sentences.en: Even innocuous substances can sometimes register a positive result in a drug test.
sentences.cn: 即使无害的物质在药物测试中有时也会呈阳性.

sentences.en: Even seemingly innocuous words are offensive in certain contexts.
sentences.cn: 甚至看似毫无恶意的言辞在某些语境下都会引起冒犯。

sentences.en: Even the most innocuous - seeming document can be a viral carrier.
sentences.cn: 甚至那些看似非常安全的文档也可能是病毒携带者.

sentences.en: He’s a perfectly innocuous young man.
sentences.cn: 他是个毫无恶意的年轻人。

sentences.en: It must not be supposed that the fall in prices thus analysed is innocuous.
sentences.cn: 我们决不能假设这样分析出来的价格下降是无害的.

sentences.en: It seemed a perfectly innocuous remark.
sentences.cn: 那像是一句毫无恶意的话。
那是一条无伤大雅的评注.

sentences.en: The key to innocuous production is to normalize the enterprise operations.
sentences.cn: 实现无害化生产的关键环节在于规范企业行为.
这种液体看来没什么危险.

sentences.en: The question appeared innocuous enough, but I still did not trust her.
sentences.cn: 这个问题看来没什么恶意, 可我仍然不相信她.

sentences.en: The seemingly innocuous Article 17 has a buzzword in European football.
sentences.cn: 这个所谓的17号条款,已经成为欧洲足坛的时髦用语了.

sentences.en: The tone of the meeting was pleasant and innocuous.
sentences.cn: 会见的调子是令人愉快和坦率的.

sentences.en: We adopt environment - keeping innocuous material and accords with international food sanitation standard.
sentences.cn: 我们采用环境无害的物质和维持符合国际食品卫生标准.

sentences.en: While that judgment may sound innocuous, it is actually striking.
sentences.cn: 这一判决看似无足轻重, 实则意义深远.

sentences.en: Yet the decision that seemed innocuous enough sparked a heated debate.
sentences.cn: 这个决定看来平实无奇,但却在当时引发了一场激烈的论战.
